long_description: The Canari Exo women's bike shorts supply padded comfort and support at a great value for any type of riding. Polyester/spandex blend quickly wicks away sweat for evaporation and offers excellent range of motion with good muscle support. 8-panel construction creates an anatomic fit for excellent performance and comfort. Women-specific chamois provides moisture-wicking performance and padded comfort; antimicrobial treatment combats odors. Compression grippers at leg openings help keep the women's Canari Exo bike shorts from riding up.
short_description: The Canari Exo women's bike shorts supply padded comfort and support at a great value for any type of riding.
